title: (x) Autodesk logo - (similar to) Vigor {Geoff}
content:
What font is this? Thx in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/adsk_logo.gif)

 [‹ (x) Cargo Magazine cover headline face - ESPN Gothic {Siung Tjia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195719/http:/typophile.com/node/19247 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) George Harrison "All Things Must Pass" album cover - Abbott Old Style {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195719/http:/typophile.com/node/19237 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wbcd

comments.content:
TheSerif?

EDIT: Oops, I jumped on this one, that’s not it.
Yeah, I was gonna post that too but it ain’t it.

It looks like [Vigor DT 2.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/vigor-dt/)

I’m not so sure, a few things don’t really match!

EDIT: It could be Vigor with the <cite>A</cite> crossbar lowered, bottom-right serif on the <cite>k</cite> stem snapped off and the ascender serifs customised.
Custom. I think it’s been mentioned before here, but can’t find it.

It appears that Dav has identified it as Vigor in a [previous thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195719/http:/typophile.com/node/13096). But it isn’t Vigor, it’s probably custom as Stephen has mentioned above. It is similar but a lot of the forms are different such as the bowl of d.
